sqlMap.update: UPDATE faq SET inquiry_category = #inquiry_category#, inquiry_subject = #inquiry_subject#, inquiry_content = #inquiry_content#, inuqiry_addfile = #inquiry_addfile# WHERE inquiry_no = #inquiry_no#
sqlMap.select: WHERE inquiry_regdate = #inquiry_regdate# between #date1# and #date2# ORDER BY inquiry_regdate DESC
